message.content:
cs.NI, cs.DC, cs.SY, cs.DS, cs.AI 

This paper deals with the problem of service migration in mobile edge computing, which involves optimizing the decision of when and where to migrate cloud-based services hosted on local edge servers as users move to new locations. This problem is relevant to several sub-fields of computer science, including network infrastructure (cs.NI), distributed computing (cs.DC), control systems (cs.SY), data structures and algorithms (cs.DS), and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper uses mathematical models and algorithms to formulate and solve the service migration problem, which is a common approach in these sub-fields. Therefore, these five sub-categories are the most likely ones for this paper.
